rooms.description: Serves as the main entrance with an open layout transitioning into a living area, designed to align with Vastu principles by having entry facing east for positive energy.
Integrated kitchen adjacent to the dining area; includes modern amenities while respecting traditional Kerala style with wooden fittings and local stone elements.
Connected to the kitchen and living area; designed for family meals and gatherings. Placed in the north-east corner as per Vastu guidelines.
Separate guest room with ensuite bathroom to accommodate visitors; located towards the east for enhanced positivity according to Vastu.
Adjacent to both the master bedroom and guest room with proper ventilation. The bathroom is placed in a north-west corner as per traditional layouts.
A quiet space for reading; located near the entrance to ensure calmness and balance; designed with large windows that face east for natural light.

openings.description: Primary entry point on the eastern facade, aligned with Vastu guidelines for prosperity and positive energy flow.
Multiple windows to ensure proper ventilation and natural light; placed respecting traditional Kerala aesthetics.
Well-designed doors for smooth internal movement.
